__e: But then, you had to, didn't you?
I know, and you had to make it and you will again, a-and the choices will always be impossible.
I mean, if he's not, you know, you had to do it.
You didn't love her, and you didn't have to explain to her family.
- Bread, you bandits! Mom, you shouldn't mess with him, really... don't allow him to eat so much bread.
With apologies much delayed. - because you didn't need to know.
You just don't know it 'cause you haven't tried it out on something you're super scared of, but you have it.
I know, and you had to make it and you will again, a-and the choices will always be impossible.
And you... [scoffs] You sure as hell wouldn't have to tell me, right?
Why did you have to put it that way?
Why'd you have to make it so quick?
Jesus, what did you have to say that for?
And when I asked you to marry me you didn't have to say yes, because we both knew.
You didn't have to. your eyes said it for you.
Why did you have to die so that I can stand here with my brother?
You didn't have to come here to say that.
Then you had to do more and more until you were doing what you didn't do best.
You had to say it was easy.
But, no, you had to come to work.
You didn't have to give up something you loved so much just for us.
L hope I didn't keep you waitin' too long.
And you didn't have to look into her eyes when she was falling!
You've always been the one who's had to make ends meet.
Look, you had to choose between two... this way. This way.
You just had to let him save you, huh?
We were having such a good time, and you had to go do this! Please...
You did what you had to, so am I.
I-I don't care, it's just that I-I need you to know that.
